label: prop-coefficient-regularity
name: Boundedness and continuity of composite coefficients

attributes_added.label: attr-bounded-on-sublevel-sets
attributes_added.expression: \text{Coefficients } C_{\text{clone},L/H}, K_{\text{clone}}, C_{\Psi,L/H}, K_{\Psi}, C_{S,\text{direct}}, C_{S,\text{indirect}}, C_{V,\text{total}} \text{ are bounded on } \mathcal{K}_R

attributes_added.label: attr-jointly-continuous
attributes_added.expression: (\mathcal{S}_1,\mathcal{S}_2)\mapsto C_{\text{clone},L/H}, K_{\text{clone}}, C_{\Psi,L/H}, K_{\Psi} \text{ are jointly continuous in } (\mathcal{S}_1,\mathcal{S}_2)

natural_language_statement: On any sublevel set K_R ⊂ Σ_N×Σ_N where (i) the number of alive walkers is bounded between 1 and N for both inputs, (ii) positions lie in a common compact subset of the algorithmic space under φ, and (iii) aggregator Lipschitz/Hölder functions and the regularized standard deviation parameters remain bounded, all state-dependent continuity coefficients (C_clone,L/H, K_clone, C_Ψ,L/H, K_Ψ, C_S,direct, C_S,indirect, C_V,total) are bounded and jointly continuous in (S₁,S₂).
